You are the Frontend Engineer on team easyrent-complete. Your task is to COMPLETE all V3 calendar improvements.

WORKING DIRECTORY: /home/sandriaas/_PROJECTS/easyrent/_apps/x-dashboard-0

TASK: Complete calendar components in apps/erp/src/components/calendar/
- ZoomControls.tsx - Day/3-Day/Week/Month view switcher (verify complete)
- CollapsibleResource.tsx - Expandable calendar resources (verify complete)
- OccupancyBadge.tsx - Color-coded occupancy display (verify complete)
- WaitingList.tsx - Waiting list component with sorting and vehicle assignment

Complete hooks in apps/erp/src/lib/hooks/
- useKeyboardNavigation.ts - Tab/Enter/Escape/Arrow navigation
- useOccupancy.ts - Occupancy calculation

Complete stores:
- apps/erp/src/stores/calendar-store.ts - Zustand v5 with persist

Wire everything together in the main calendar view.

Use context7 MCP to query Zustand and React documentation.

DO NOT STOP until all calendar features are complete. Work autonomously.
